description: Try our easy to follow Warm Broccolini & Paneer Salad With Green Goddess Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Warm Broccolini & Paneer Salad With Green Goddess Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup natural nibble mix, toasted (see tip)

recipeInstructions.text: To make green goddess sauce, place peas, avocado, yoghurt, mint leaves, parsley, lemon and olive oil into a food processor and blitz until smooth. Season to taste and set aside.
Heat a barbecue or grill pan over high heat. Toss the broccolini with 1 tbs of oil and cook for 4 minutes, or until just tender and charred. Place on a plate and loosely cover with foil.

Brush both sides of paneer with remaining oil and sprinkle with garam masala. Cook for 4 minutes, turning once, or until golden. Drain on kitchen paper and set aside. When cool, slice into logs and break into large chunks.
Spread some of the sauce on a platter, top with broccolini and paneer and scatter with nibble mix. Serve with remaining sauce on the side.
